description: A combination cough syrup containing dextromethorphan (cough suppressant) and guaifenesin (expectorant) for relief of cough and chest congestion.
Combination analgesic and muscle relaxant containing paracetamol 650 mg and orphenadrine citrate 50 mg per tablet, used for relief of painful muscle spasm and musculoskeletal pain.
Unani herbal sachets for relief of cold/cough symptoms; dissolve one sachet in hot water or tea and sip slowly.

registration_number: Multivitamin supplement containing Zinc, Vitamin E, C, Folic Acid and B-Complex for vitality support.
